statements: SELECT * FROM CreditCardInfo WHERE id = 1;
SELECT card_holder_name, card_number FROM CreditCardInfo WHERE expiration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT billing_address FROM CreditCardInfo ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM CreditCardInfo WHERE cvv = '123' AND card_holder_name LIKE 'John%';
SELECT id, cvv FROM CreditCardInfo WHERE card_holder_name = 'Alice' ORDER BY expiration_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM CreditCardInfo WHERE id = 1;
SELECT card_holder_name, card_number FROM CreditCardInfo WHERE expiration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, card_number, expiration_date FROM CreditCardInfo WHERE card_holder_name LIKE 'John%';
SELECT * FROM CreditCardInfo WHERE cvv = '123' AND expiration_date < '2022-12-31';
SELECT id, card_holder_name, billing_address FROM CreditCardInfo WHERE billing_address LIKE '%Avenue';
SELECT * FROM credit_cards;
SELECT card_holder_name, expiration_date FROM credit_cards WHERE id = 100;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, location FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT card_holder_name, card_number, expiration_date, cvv FROM credit_cards WHERE card_holder_name LIKE '%John%';
SELECT * FROM transactions ORDER BY amount DESC, transaction_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM credit_cards WHERE expiration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT card_holder_name, card_number FROM credit_cards WHERE id = 3;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT card_number, card_holder_name FROM credit_cards WHERE card_holder_name LIKE 'J%' AND card_number LIKE '4%';
SELECT card_holder_name, amount, location FROM credit_cards JOIN transactions ON credit_cards.id = transactions.card_id;
SELECT * FROM CreditCards;
SELECT id, card_holder_name, expiration_date FROM CreditCards WHERE id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT id, card_number, expiration_date FROM CreditCards ORDER BY expiration_date DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_transactions FROM Transactions;
SELECT * FROM FraudulentTransactions WHERE fraudulent_reason IS NOT NULL ORDER BY fraudulent_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM CreditCards ORDER BY card_holder_name DESC;
SELECT id, card_holder_name, expiration_date FROM CreditCards WHERE expiration_date < CURRENT_DATE;
SELECT t.id, t.amount, ft.fraudulent_reason FROM Transactions t JOIN FraudulentTransactions ft ON t.id = ft.transaction_id;
SELECT cc.card_holder_name, COUNT(t.id) AS total_transactions FROM CreditCards cc LEFT JOIN Transactions t ON cc.id = t.credit_card_id GROUP BY cc.card_holder_name;
SELECT cc.card_holder_name, SUM(t.amount) AS total_spent FROM CreditCards cc LEFT JOIN Transactions t ON cc.id = t.credit_card_id GROUP BY cc.card_holder_name HAVING SUM(t.amount) > 1000;
SELECT * FROM CreditCards;
SELECT card_number, expiration_date FROM CreditCards ORDER BY expiration_date DESC;
SELECT card_holder_name, card_number FROM CreditCards WHERE expiration_date > '2023-01-01';
SELECT * FROM IdentityThieves WHERE name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT id, transaction_date FROM Transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM CreditCards WHERE expiration_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT card_holder_name, card_number FROM CreditCards ORDER BY card_holder_name DESC;
SELECT name, email FROM IdentityThieves WHERE name LIKE 'A%' AND email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT id, amount, transaction_date FROM Transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT Transactions.id, Transactions.amount, FraudulentActivity.reason FROM Transactions INNER JOIN FraudulentActivity ON Transactions.id = FraudulentActivity.transaction_id;
SELECT * FROM credit_cards;
SELECT card_holder, card_number FROM credit_cards WHERE expiration_date > '2022-06-30';
SELECT id, card_holder, expiration_date FROM credit_cards WHERE card_holder LIKE 'J%';
SELECT * FROM transactions ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM fraud_transactions WHERE timestamp > '2022-06-01 00:00:00';
SELECT * FROM credit_cards;
SELECT card_number, expiration_date FROM credit_cards WHERE card_holder = 'Alice';
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT fraudsters.name, fraud_transactions.details FROM fraud_transactions INNER JOIN fraudsters ON fraud_transactions.fraudster_id = fraudsters.id;

SELECT stolen_cards.reason, fraudsters.name, credit_cards.card_number FROM stolen_cards INNER JOIN fraudsters ON stolen_cards.fraudster_id = fraudsters.id INNER JOIN credit_cards ON stolen_cards.card_id = credit_cards.id;
